comment._content: What this photo has got to do with a nuclear test is driving me nuts!

comment.author: 77015680@N05
comment._content: I don't know for sure either! My own best guess is that it's a joke "seismograph".

comment.author: 48864106@N05
comment._content: Would the Archives have a CW wartime photo of Col/Gen Mark Lowrey, CSA?  One of my Confederate ancestors was in the 32nd Mississippi Inf of which Lowrey was colonel.

comment.author: 77015680@N05
comment._content: A good question, but I'm not sure if we have such a picture or not straight off. First try and searching our online catalog. Check also the Biographical Index. You can also consider putting a research request. I hope that helps, and good luck!
comment.authorname: Mississippi Department of Archives and History
